text:
Bhai, us Hall 3 ki Galaxy me kuch sabse bdiya chiz hui thi to vo hain tera or loki ka apni zindagi me entry marna, us galaxy ke baad se 4th year ke end tak aisi koi jgah nahi jha sath na bna ho
ab aapki taarifo me kya kya likhe,  aapko to swayam Dubey ji ne Indian education system ka best product bola (sirf 12th tak ka), Nana or Shrotriya ka perspective changer, Loki or suppu ka intellect partner, ostwal ka bitching partner or apna BRO
The only behaviourally qualified & emotionally suitable Sutradhar.....
Sath bana rahe Shukla ji abhi to bhot kaand karne hain....
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Or bhai, sutts hain kya? üòâ
Inter-hall relations ka constant critique, Nipun ki faatu aadato ko zikr krna wala FlagBearer, Ostwal ka Assaulter, KT-Varun ka song partner or Apna Sutts partner üíôüíô 

Bhai, tere sarcasm level tk pahuchne ke liye mujhe 2-3 mortein lagane pdenge üòú, Roorkee me to apne room me kya maje mare the yaar, or 6th sem ki starting me volley üíñ, bs hume jivan me ek tuccha kam krna pd gya tha- kisi ke paap saaf krne pd gye the.

Bhai, aise hi apne teekhe teekhe shabdo se sarcasm-leela rachte raho or chapte rho.

Har Har Mahadev, Bolo Ganga Maiya ki Jai!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
College life ki ekmatra ladki, jise me jab chahu, jo chahu galiya du,
4 saal humari bakchodiyo ko sahne ke liye dhanyvaad,
apne Dram career ki chapu actor, acche songs share krne wali ladki, thodi si fattu, thodi si kutil, thodi si samjhdar, thodi si naadan or puri ki puri humari ladaliüòõ

Dosti bani rhe, chatur, chalak, chanchal, chuheya,
Ek word or add krna tha lekin abhi mood nahi üòÜ

P.S.- agar teko techkriti me gale ka vo chain mila hota to vo teri size ka hota kya?

Aur ha, Ab rulau kya?
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Or Senator Sharma,
Bhai, tere se jyda junooni aadmi nhi dekha (ha, senate election ki hi baat kr rha), yaad hain jab Votes me 2nd preference ke liye G-Bot ko manipulate krne ki soch rhe the ü§™
Lekin, ant tk aate aate sapna pura ho hi gya, HAB ke kaamo ki to kitni hi taarif kre, vha to tune gadar chapa, lekin tune mess chod ke accha nhi kiya üòî, mera dal-bati ka sapna tha tu hota to pura ho jata... khair,
Baaki muddo pr jyda bat hui nhi lekin sharma ji ke bete ho to chapu to honge hi 
Good luck for the future!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Or Moti G**d, bhai shuru end se krte hain, bkl meko lag rha tha tu kabhi BT nhi dikhayega lekin tum to MC college chod kr bhag nikle, bhai kya maje aa rhe the last dino me, BC season ball se wing me phatta bc kisi ki aukat nahi apne alava or vo B block ka rooftop, bhai jaate jaate sare paap kra diya tujhse (in paapo ka bhagidar kaun hain me nahi janta), lekin mast maja aaya.
 Bhai, apun to jaati bhai hain (highly irrelevant baat apne conversation me), lekin bhai apne se chill maje kabhi nhi mare honge jab kisi moment me apun sath honge, bhai vo 50ML bar, aaaaaahhhhhhh............., yaad krke maja aa gya! Bc usse yaad aaya, answer me digit to badla kar, itna chill nhi marna hota lekin itne chillax hokr tune yogi man ko MTH101 se deregister krwa diya, aise dil ko tagda sukkon mila tha (Gogi Boy, Haaye Haaye). 
Aur kya likhe bhai TA202 me fraud partner, kabhi bhi MT chala lo bhai ko, na to kabhi sunne hi nhi milega. 
Some advices- 1) BT kam socha kro (bas aise hi likh diya),
                             2) Stay away from aurat ka chakkar. Be single, be chutiya. Bc tum bhi bandi wale ho gaye, aise dil ko badiya laga lekin dimag ko gehra sadma laga, lekin tune ignore nhi kiya hume (ostwal ki tarah- austwaaaal murdabaad !), thanks for that.
Bhai, apun to milenge, teko dekh hi feel aati ki hum to zarur milenge, lekin tb tk ke liye alvida mote!
üíô
Dindor.
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Bhai Girish,
hum sabki life ke sabse jhak marne wale dino me kisi ne maje dilwaye hain to vo tu hain, tere or nipun ke sath itne tatti tatti scene bnaye ki soch ke hi hasi aa jati,
bhai ko end me jaKR MOOSSS nikalne ki bhot bhot badhai, tere or barwal ke sath kai logo ki bitching kri hain, 2nd year college life ke sabse yadgar saal tha or usme bhi teri anginat bakchodiya, scene se lekr 1st year ki ragging, kya maje mare the yaar, Summer workshop se lekr nukkad me mere sath iklauta 2nd year (Nukkad Zindabaad!!!!)
fir vaps kabhi na kabhi bakchodi pelenge dost, tab tk ke liye alvida!
bs jaisa hain vese hi rhna, kyuki tu usi me bakchod hain or usi me duniya ki mar lega!

text:
JD Bro, 1st year rommie, tumne bhi side bed le liya yaar,  
yaad hain apun teeno Rommie orientation se lekr har audition tak sath me jate the, Those Were the Days. 
tum to bade heavy driver ho bhai, tumhari itni tarrife kri ki bandi tumhe utha kr hi le gayi ya tum khud uth kr chal diye, taarif kitni kre bhai tumhari, jha bhai ke kadam pad jate vo ilaka bhai ka hona hi hain, so here's a piece of advice/request/suggestion from my side- jab Glory tumhare kadam chume to jaise ho vese hi rhna,  kyoki vo bhot heavy dose me aane wali hain.
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Aur Jetti, 
Tum to mera aehsan-mand rahogi zindagi-bhar, alphabetical order me gaaliya sikhayi hain tumhe.
1st year ki DOAA ki mastiyo me tumhara entry marna sabse bekar kaam hua, lekin agar tum na aati to hume terminate hone se kaun bachata, Thanks for that. ü•∞
Jetti thodi importance ka lalach rakhti hain lekin dil ki buri nahi hain, jab bhi bhaiya-bhabhi room se nikalte, nikal jati thi üòù 
Jetti paisa kharch krne me piche nahi hatti, lekin uske liye ya to tumhe taarif krni hogi ya 2-3 gaaliya deni hongi. ü§™
Jetti ko katiyar ka saath humesha mila hain, lekin Jetti uski tarah gandagi nhi failati. Good Jetti Good.
Jetti ko maine to bandiyo ke sath ghumte nhi dekha aapne dekha ho to, Haramkhor Stalk krna band kr, Jetti 5-6 body-guards ko lekr ghumti,
Jetti ki bewkoofiyat janni ho to me bta du ye Hyderabad se ek baar Veg-Biryani laayi thi,
Jetti eksath 2-3 internship karti hain or backstage pr aakr bolti hain kuch nhi ho rha zindagi me, man krta hain utha kr kachre me dal aaye par fir yaad aata hain treat bhi yhi degi,
Jetti is quite under-rated as an actor (Only Anchal & Palak will understand)

At the end , main yhi khna chahunga, Jetti supportive, mastikhor, thodi chanchal (Not Apoorva) hain,
So, Don't be like Jetti!
author: Rochak  Dindor

Aisa koi maja nahi jo humne jiya nahi,
Aisi koi yaad nahi jisme sath piya nahi!

author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Bhai üíô
Kha se shuru kre bhai
My college life - You = 0 (ye pd ke KT kabhi na kabhi tana zarur dega)
BC ab bta kha se shuru kre, har jgah hi to tu hain yaar, pehli baat to same hall, same wing, fir club me sath ghuse or same pehla nukkad, apna to coaching teacher bhi same nikal aaye yaar, dekh yaadein bhot sari hain main bs yha likh deta hu taaki kabhi vaps pde to yaad aaye ki hum college ke langotiya yaar the-
1st sem - Bc dram eve 1 or vo NSS wala nukkad, sutradhar nhi krna tha yaar vo bhi chashma pahn kr ü§™ü§™ü§™
Iske end tk tujhe gaaliya dilwana sikha diya tha.

2nd sem - Hall 3 ki galaxy, abey tu fraud mar gya usme, lekin vo teri TB ki bimari or ha vo hospital me yogi chomu bna rha tha, vo mujhe dekh rhi thi na ki use, isi sem se tum hum laundo ko ignore marne laga tha, Aurat ka chakkar Babu bhaiya. aurat ka chakkar

1st year ka summer - workshop bc mujhe koi role nhi mila , nahi yaad krna üòë

3rd sem - Aaaaahhhhhh 2nd-year ki Dram eve 1, or Anatragani, tum to play me chale gaye mitra, yha se tumhara Yugo ka existential bahar futne laga, maine maine sambhala tujhe

2nd year Winter - inter IIT bhai, most importantly tune......- old monk zindabad üòÖü§£

4th sem - galaxy bhai, kya haga bhai tune nukkad me lekin haar ka kabhi dukh nhi hua , itne salo baad kuch shuru hua hall me or hum lucky hain ki humare time shuruat hui, Hall 2 Zindabad

2nd year summer + 5th sem= bhai kya hi bolu yaar, tune dikhaya nhi bs lekin tere jitna dedicated banda nhi dekha maine, Proud hi Proud! chap hi diye tum sab log yaar, KT, varun, nipun, tu, jetti, nana (feel dila di bhai) Fursat Mandli Zindabad!
Y17 Ka tempo high hain.

3rd year winter - Arey director sahab! mujhe monoact me break dene ka shukriya, mana ki atyant haga maine lekin sahne ke liye shukriya, or nipun, varun ke sath december ke vo din bhai, Mauj kr di thi apun ne to ( Best days at IITK)ü§©ü§©ü§©
Baaki dec ke last dino ko hum sab yaad nhi krna chahengeüòêüòê

6th sem- bhai Dram trophy bhai, play me role dene ka shukriya, mere hagodpan ko sahne ka shukriya.

Or fir kisi haram ke jane ne ek chamgadad kha liya vo bhi kaccha, Humara bhai bhul gaya bich me 3-4 mahine, fir aaya 7th sem humne jam ke cheat kiya or kuch dino ke liye campus bhi aana hua humara in final sem, bhai bola meko nirvana mil gya maine bola hut mand*rc*d, tum ch*iye ho vhi rhoge.

Or bhai, aao mile fir generation gap kam kre, ek baat bta breakup ke baad bitching kaun krta bandi ke sath.

Alvida Bhai, ab taarif krne ka man hain lekin jyda krunga to log bolenge faltu ki haank rha hain, to logo ko humari dosti ki kasme khane do, hum kabhi mauka mila to tere paiso se zomato pr order kr paneer ki sabji khayenge. or shukla se jabardasti paap krwayenge. ü§£
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Or Moti,
Epitome of Kanjoosi, lekin bs bhai ab tumhari naukri lag gayi bhot jyda paiso wali, ab thode time paal lo hume, 

Teri daant or taane sunte sunte 4 saal nikal gaye, pata hi nhi chala, yaad kr vo din moti jab 1st year me DOAA canteen me pde rhte the, tum to explore krne har jgah chali gayi, humara dil to ek jgah aa gya lekin tune apni daanto or samajhdari se mahool banaye rakha,
Kha tha maine aao B-115 adventure me part lo, lekin nahi, dekha result, azadi ki aakhri waqt me 10 rupay ki goli se khud ko dilasa dena pda, kanjoosi ka fal üòú

Bidai ke in bhavuk shano me,  main shukriya ada krna chahunga teri daanto ka jinka mujhpr koi asar nahi hua, teri rakhi ka jispe maine koi gift nhi diya (khud ke paiso ka hi dunga üò§), shukriya ada krna chahunga tere andar ki chul ka jisne chuhiya se raaz khulwaye,
Or ha advice dena chahunga ki ab kanjoosi me kami lao baaki jaisi samjhdar hain vesi bni rh, koi to ho aas pas me samjhdar üòÑüòÜ

Chal Tata, aata rhunga tere pas to! ü§ó

3rd year tak sirf courses share kiye hain, shuraat ki thi SOC171 se (kya rata tha bhai tune üòù) or ending hui PSY499 par jiska endsem zoom call pr de rhe the ü§™, usse yaad aaya humari pehli formal/informal mulakat tb hui thi jab CC band ho gya tha or hum padne ke liye staff canteen gye the,

text:
Landge Bhai,
Shuru to me esc101 se hi krunga, bhai tu nahi hota to mera jarur fakka hota, sare code tere tape, tune kabhi mana bhi nhi kiya, me hall 2 se niklne ke pehle call krta ki tu nikla ya nahi taaki saath baith paye ü§£, uske baad ham DOAA jate the kabhi kabhar, tu, nana or esc101, zindagi bhar yaad rhega mujhe, usse yaad aaya PE me bhi to same group tha, me, tu or chouhan mil kr fraud marte the 2nd sem me, PHY102 me hum tutorial me discuss krte the ki pass honge ya nahi, Golden 1st Year,
Lekin bc branch alag nikli, lekin dynamics me bhi sath nhi chuta, fir hum kabhi kabhar academic area and NCL me mila krte the lekin humesha aisa lagta tha ki kal hi to mile the üíñ
Bhai, maine campus me bhot kam log dekhe jo bina kisi gile-shikve ke logo ki help krte hain, tu unme se ek hain, Love you bhai, 
Humesha aise bne rh, mast placement lagwa or mujhe ummid hain kisi mod pr vaps mile to aise hi milenge jaise roj ki baat hoüíôüíô
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:

sabse hardworking or sabse gande sticker rakhne wala aadmi, bhai tere whatsapp pr kand or real life me kaam, dono ki barabari karna mushkil hain, whatsapp pr isiliye kyuki tumne vipul bhai ko kisi ka lovely soulmate bana diya,  or real life me aapke achievements ke kya hi kahne.

text:
Shiavm Bhai, 
most under-rated Batsman of C-TOP, or zeher dancer, bhai tujhe dekh kar ekdum chill ho jane ki feel aa jati, to humesha aise hi rhna, fir na jane kab mulaqat ho lekin jab bhi hogi, phatta khelenge kisi corridor me or aas pas hagga hoga to darwaza zarur band rakhenge.
Tata
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Or Dasse,
First-year Dram eve 2 se Second-year Dram eve 1 tk kaafi accha waqt bitaya, summer play me initially completely rejected bando me se hum kuch hi the (Dard hi Dard), KPS se 20 rupay wala incident to mast tha, 
Kaafi Dedicated, hard-working or honest insaan, tujhe dekhkr bhot kuch sikhne mila hain Dost, 
milenge kabhi, tab tak ke liye alvida!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Convener bhai,
2nd year me raushan ke sath dekha tha laga kitna rude aadmi hain, fir galaxy ho gyi or dekha arey bc ye to apna hi launda hain üòâ
Fir to #mechbros se lekr 3rd year galaxy tk jo scene chala hain, 321 me marwane ke baad me or bera tujhe humare compulsory exam beer programme pr le gye or tujhe sukoon ka aehsas krwaya ü§™
Bhai ek baat ki taarif krna chahunga, tu kabhi lead lene me or dare krne se dara nahi, naye course ke adventure to tune kiye hi hain, lekin sabse khas vo tha jab bina club ke part hue tune hss ke event ki jimmedari li, proud of you bhai !

Those were the days jab raushan_putra_sahil ki mara krte the, tum hi ho convener humare asli presiden jisne nepotism ko haraya hain, Hail Convener!

Milne ka scene nhi pta, tu to final sem nhi aaya, lekin bhai tujhe miss kiya, ummid krta hu life me jab bhi milenge, ek dusre ko or bhosdike dildor and or bhosdike convener bolte hue milenge, 
Tab tk ke liye Alvida bhai!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Ram, Shyam, Champioooooooon (Girish ki aawaz me)
Champion Champion......
Bhai Barwal, mere jivan me upje jatiwaad ke beejo ko ugaane ka credit puri tarike se tujhe jata hain (Fakar Hain, jaatiwad ban rahe!) life me conviction ke sath aage badhna bhai tere se hi sikha hain! 
Hall 4 ki chai ke sath or hall2 ki quad me vo patelgiri, kiski CPI kitni,  kiski jaat kaunsi vgerh vgerh, those were the days...... 
Bhai tujhe bhot miss krunga yaar, tu hi to asli bhand partner tha jo kabhi high nhi hota, tune hi to nana ki life set krwayi, tune hi to club me bandiyo ke character nibhaye, tere hi role ke karan Loki ko play me 2-3 dialoge mile
baaki teri preparation ke liye good luck, garda to tu faadne wala hain hi, bs kripa drishti bnaye rakhana!

Alvida Yaaseeem!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Somu bhai,
Be as generous, genuine, helpful and charming as you are, nhi to duniya ka kya hoga üòÑ.
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Suppu,
Chalta firta encyclopedia or b-bot ka sasta library, an avid learner or har jgah chapne wala aadmi.

Suppu, dekho all the best bolna bhi teri beizzati ho jayega, kyoki tu jo krne jayega usme tujhe already pta hoga ki ye kaam to best hone wala hain. Lekin dil ke dilase ko itna bolte hain ki
Bring the Glory, Man!

Or ha kabhi naha bhi liya kro bhai.üòõ
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Doremon ne jab apne pocket se G**d faadne ki machine nikali thi to us machine ke kuch ansh Hall 12 me gir gye the, un ansho ne aaps me judkr ek aadmi ko janm diya- VARUN JAIN 

Juniors ki  faadni ho, seniors ki jalani ho, batchmate ki  leni ho, in sab kaamo ka Gawd hain apna bhai, Kabhi kabhar lagta hain jab kabhi G**d Faadu Ratna ka janm hoga to uska nam hoga Varun Jain Puruskar.

 Nostalgia chedna hain kya, bhai apun to humesha sath rhe hain, jab sabhi hall galaxy ki heat me L lagwa rhe the, tb me or tu side view se inke maje le rhe the, jab kuch log hum dono ke liye aansu baha rhe the tb bhi hum side view se maje le rhe the, jab rendezevous or inter iit har gye the tb bhi hum maje mar rhe theüòÇ
 
Tu to apna bhand forever wala dost hain, kabhi bhand na hokr bhi permanent bhand, kabhi kabhar lagta hain tu nhi hota/ho to hum sab aaps me bhid jaye, kaat mare ek dusre ko fir piche se aayega tu or sab chupchap bhand hone lag jayenge, Lekin, lekin, Nana ke dj khalid wale moment pr tune vo meri hospital wali story yaad nhi rakhi bc, Shame VJ shame!
 
Confession- Bhai tu jab jab roya hain tb tb sabki lagi hain, to bc roya mat krüòá
 
Taarif kya kre bhai, burai to kabhi kr nhi paye, kabhi try kiya ho to agle second kuch sarcastic aaya hoga or khud ki marwa li hogi maine, lekin itna zarur khunga ki hum sabko aise hi darate, hasate hue connected rakhiyo, kyoki is connection me investment bada hain mitra, kuch ki vo chudwayi hain (KT), to kuch ko vo ke pas jane se rok diya ( or nipun bhai, kem cho), kuch vo ke pas chale jate the to pakad kr laate the (nana aka joru ka gulam), kuch ki vo humare sath hi thi, or jetti kisi ki vo nhi bn payi, 
Interesting fact:- upar likhe sare kamo ko bhi me, tu or aishwarya hum sath krte the, or fir maje lete the, 

Thanks bolna tha bhai tujhe, Hall12/2 ki sabhi bhand musical nights ke liye, sabhi volleyball wali memories ke liye, saari canteen ki bakchodiyo ke liye, Dec wale dino ke liye, un sabhi taano ke liye jo tune hume diye or hum sath khade hue or fir bakchodi peli üíôüíôüíô

Bhai, tujhe alvida likhne ki iccha nhi ho rhi üòë
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
TG bhai,
4th-year se pehle shayd hi kabhi khul kr baat hui hogi (typical baniye wale meme ko chod kar üòâ), lekin 4th-year ke last 2 mahine me jo gyan bahaya hain na bhai tune, bhai baba bano, bhot scope hain!
rooftop ki meet se itna to pta chala ki tu kaafi expressive hain, or un expression ko articulate kaafi sahi krta (Height wale complexion pr maja aa gya), 
Baaki kabhi vaps milna hua to rooftop pr jakr, thoda mahool bna kr, photo khichenge tere i-phone se,
tab tk apne bhakto se haal-chaal puchte rahna üôèüôè
vese meri yaad to aati rhegi, yha ka bio maine suggest kiya tha (credit le rha), 
Tata!
author: Rochak  Dindor

main abhi bhi kh rha Bengal bhul kr Rajasthan aa jao, roshgulla ke chakkar me Dal-bati chod rhe, btao, kaise aadmi ho.
or ha gym- trainer bno to hame free ki entry de dena or vaps se karmath chatra bne to jhande to gaad hi doge.
All the best motu bhai!
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Yazza bro,
Do chize bolni hain, ek to 3 saal tk paracetamol dene ka shukriya, dusri last year me papa papa b***ies wale moment ke liye maafi, lekin dekho maja to tumhe bhi aaya tha us role-play me. 
Aise hi humesh helpful or cheering bne rho, All the best for your future !
author: Rochak  Dindor

text:
Arey Yogi Man,
Me puri story likhunga pehle fir dekhte kya likhne ka mood banta, maine pehli baar tujhe wing ke whatsapp group pr dekha tha jab sab apne nam bhej rhe the photo ke sath, or me nam dekh kr khush ho gya tha, ki ye rha apna bhai, fir dusri mulakat hui CTop ki roof pr vha aap dhuaa uda rhe the, aapne hume kuch skills sikhayi or guru-shishya parampara shuru ho gayi, yaad hain jab hum choti wali GF udate the to ostwal bolta tha abey kam kro ab ye sab ü§£ü§£
Next sem ostwal TB sath laya or hum gaye us hospital me, kya mast chai banayi thi us chotu ne, or vo bandi kise dekh rhi thi, ab tk no idea üòâ
Galaxy me Subh ki 5 bje tu jaga rhta tha taaki roof pr jakr pi paye, maja aata tha bhai 1st year me, sirf bakchodi pelte the,
Summer me vo b-bot me kone wala room or partiya hi partiya, lekin sabse jyda maja aaya B-115 me, kya nhi kiya us room me, kya nhi dekha us room me, our sweet home, aisa lagta hain zindagi se vaps kuch mangna ho to me B-115 wale din mangu, tb bhi jab hum teeno sath me the or tb bhi jab hum do the, sabse aachi yaad to vo baarish wale din ki hain, mera tum dono pr gussa krna, bc teri ultiya saaf krna, apna bhand hona, galaxy krna, college life ke 2 saal jis jgah se guzare ho uske liye words to nhi hain, lekin bhot maja aaya, me soch rha tha important important chize likh du, lekin ab jab soch rha to sab kuch accha lag rha (ye aalas nhi hain)

Tere bare me kya likhu yaar, bakchodi to peli hain sath me, tere sath hi shayd kabhi low na feel hua ho, jab sath me the to sirf bakchodi peli,
I hope hum life me kabhi disconnect na ho, kuch hi to log hain jinse disconnect hone me dar lagta hain, baaki tu sudhr ja thoda bc, log maje ke liye aate, sabko bhav kyu dena bc, or ha thodi haramgiri me kami lao bhai, tere bina kaise jiyunga,
Khna bhot kuch hain likha kuch ja nhi rha to bs itni si baat hain ki jab zindagi bhot acche moments de rhi thi to sath me the, jin moments me sath nhi the to bhi sath the, to safar lamba hain, raaste uljhe hue, aadte khrab or ummide bhot
To in ummido me se ek ummid ye krta hu ki is safar ke har raaste pr hum mile, kuch aadte barkrar rakhte hue fir se milne ki ummid kre.

Tab tk ke liye Mohabbat hi Mohabbat.
author: Rochak  Dindor
